The weavers pocket-book, or, Weaving spiritualized in a discourse wherein men employed in that occupation are instructed how to raise heavenly meditations from the several parts of their work : to which also are added some few moral and spiritual observations relating both to that and other trades / by J.C. Collinges, John, 1623-1690.
[12], 164 p.
s.n.], [S.l. : 1695.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
